document_data.mainbody:
il Fezmor was a member of Fetchers Brats and later the Guild in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Fezmor was a young human girl with a light skin tone, light brown eyes, and chestnut hair. She wore a garb dyed with the Guilds green color and had a business-like demeanor.
In the , Lil Fezmor was a part of a street urchin gang led by Osgur "Fetcher" Hallorn. When the man disappeared following a guild war breaking out between Nine-Fingers Keene and the Stone Lord, Fetchers Brats were taken in by the Guild and given shelter in the Guildhall. Sticky Dondo took on the role of leader among the kids and Lil Fezmor kept herself busy, sending clients to Sticky, who sold all sorts of "acquired" goods.
